gobblin.runtime.api

Interface JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JobSpecScheduler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJobSpecScheduler, ImmediateJobSpecScheduler, JobSpecSchedulerListeners, QuartzJobSpecScheduler

    public interface JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer
    Implemented by classes that can manage a collection of JobSpecSchedulerListener instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<JobSpecSchedulerListener> getJobSpecSchedulerListeners() 
      void registerJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener) 
      void registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener)
      Like registerJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener) but it will create a weak reference.
      void unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener) 

    • Method Detail

      • registerJobSpecSchedulerListener

        void registerJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener)

      • registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener

        void registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener)
        Like registerJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed used unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener).

      • unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener

        void unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener)

      • getJobSpecSchedulerListeners

        List<JobSpecSchedulerListener> getJobSpecSchedulerListeners()
